thread.title_full: Bella Hadid wears white dress to DKNY event in New York | Daily Mail Online

author: Mike Larkin For Dailymail.Com
title: Bella Hadid wears white dress to DKNY event in New York | Daily Mail Online
text: Buy now Family fortunes: She is the daughter of multimillionaire property developer Mohamed Hadid Bella is no doubt green with envy after it emerged Selena Gomez and her ex The Weeknd are becoming quite the couple. The Good For You singer, 24, has is said to have ''fallen hard and fast' for her new beau, with the relationship of one month supposedly turning 'serious.' It was also reported the performers were kissing and holding hands in Italy during a luxurious getaway that is costing them nearly $250,000. Clotheshorse: She showed off her talents by standing at various angles Taken for a spin: She showcased her rudimentary skills in the DJ booth Mute: Thankfully she spent most her of her time posing with the equipment Come And Get It singer Selena and her new man supposedly started 'hanging out' in November when the singer completed a rehab stint for depression. And it has been claimed Bella is 'pissed' about their relationship, even though the brunette lovelies are not the closest of friends. Indeed it has been suggested she 'reached out' to her former flame so she could tell him the actress is 'using him.' When photos of Selena draping herself over the singer and kissing him appeared in January, Bella immediately unfollowed her love rival on Instagram, and the classy model then posted a selfie where she was flashing her middle finger. Loving it: She was revelling in every moment as the centre of attention Upside down world: In a narcissistic turn she was delighted to have found a photo of herself Thrilled: And she was even more pleased when she saw bigger pictures of herself Desk job: Amazingly a large group of people had gathered to get an autograph Sitting pretty: The excitement reached new heights when she smiled at the camera Share or comment on this article 79
